container.field: Search123 listings are distributed across carefully selected, high-quality small and medium-sized content sites, directories and search engines. For a list of some of the sites within the Search123 network, please click here
What is Search123's Traffic Partner Program?

The Search123 Traffic Partner Program allows qualified content sites, directories and search engines to distribute Search123's advertiser listings. Partners implement Search123's search functionality using one of our implementation kits and share in the click-through revenue generated by visitors that use the search functionality and click on Search123's paid listings.
How many searches and clicks do you get on the Search123 network?

Whilst we do not make that information specifically available, our network is made up of many high-quality content sites, directories and search engines that generate millions of searches and qualified clicks to our advertisers each month.
